says Michael Vick told him that he would not be attending any public parties while in Dallas. ''I spoke to Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his schedule here,'' Roger Goodell said. He has said on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of party and he had no intention of participating in that. I'm extremely proud of what Michael Vick has done. He's taken his responsibility seriously. ''I support him and I want to make sure he doesn't put himself in a position where he doesn't make bad decisions or have bad things happening around him. Former Colts and Bucs coach Tony Dungy , a Michael Vick mentor, confirmed Roger Goodell 's statement about Michael Vick avoiding any party being thrown under name. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. ''Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: ''For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''
